D

de.gnwi.spicesviewer - package de.gnwi.spicesviewer
Spices Viewer:
This application validates and displays an entered SPICES line notation using the GraphStream dynamic graph library.
DEFAULT_CSS_STYLESHEET - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The stylesheet to be added to the graph when the external resource can not be found.
DEFAULT_EDGE_WEIGHT - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The default edge weight value for the UserPreferences when the user has not specified a value.
DEFAULT_ERROR_COLOR - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The default color for the application's error messages.
DEFAULT_NODE_COLOR - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The default node color to be used when the graph's stylesheet does not define one.
DEFAULT_NODE_WEIGHT - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The default node weight value for the UserPreferences when the user has not specified a value.
DEFAULT_USER_IMAGE_FILE_DIR - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The default value for the directory the user set to save the image files to.
DEFAULT_VALID_COLOR - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
The default color for the application's 'valid' message.
doInBackground() - Method in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.ImageExportFileSinkImagesWorker
Exports the given graph by using GraphStream's FileSinkImages as an image file.
doInBackground() - Method in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.ImageExportGraphAttributeWorker
Exports the given graph by adding a 'ui.screenshot' attribute to it that the GraphStream Viewer intercepts causing it to export the graph (the visible section if it has been dragged and/or zoomed).
doInBackground() - Method in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.ShowStatusMessageWorker
Presents the given message in the given status label (painted in the given color) and resets the label's text after a defined amount of time (Constants.MESSAGE_SHOWING_TIME_MILLIS).
DOUBLE_INPUT_PATTERN - Static variable in class de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants
A Pattern to filter all illegal inputs into the node and edge weight JTextFields in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
